feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove watchtower by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14989
  • Issue where looping wasn't working due to missing context by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14991

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.1.2...3.1.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • turning on AI flags by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14990

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.1.3...3.2.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Correct automation cron server timestamp by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14979
  • Use real Bull queues for testing by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14984
  • prevent attachment column updates when importing budibase templates by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15000

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.0...3.2.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow December in cron validation by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15014
  • Csp updates by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15003

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.1...3.2.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • enable proxy buffering for calls to OIDC endpoints by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15015

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.2...3.2.3
